metadata.name: Project Ghost// #1
metadata.description: FVCKRENDER prioritizes innovation not just within the creation of his work, but within the experience of collecting it as well. He understands that engagement is tantamount to fostering community, and applies his approach to each aspect of the piece, from the art itself to the drop strategy, effectively incentivizing the next wave of collectors. Creating an experience with these very collectors in mind, the iconic artist collaborates with Manifold to release THE REVEAL OF THE GHOST//.
